com.ibm.awb.launcher
Class ServerApp

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.aglet.system.ContextAdapter
      com.ibm.awb.launcher.ServerApp
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContextListener, java.util.EventListener
public class ServerApp
extends ContextAdapter

The ServerApp example illustrates how to embed the AgletsServer facility into an application program.

Version:
1.00 $Date: 2009/07/28 07:04:53 $
Author:
Mitsuru Oshima
